name: ShiodomeTrainSimulator
description:
I am preparing for English Version. Current version is not fully support English texts. But I am trying to make it.

Overview

This is a game in which you drive a fictional railroad line called Shiodome Railway. You can also enjoy the scenery of many realistic railcars running.
.

What is the Shiodome Railway?

It is made in the image of a railroad in the Kanto region. We have prepared various areas for the route, including double track sections, single track, and *double-double track.
*Local trains and Express trains are separated to add more trains and faster operation.
The length of the line is about 70 km from Nagamori to Shiodome-Chuo, and even longer if three branch lines are included.
Single-line sections will appear in the future. Data on the line and the timetable itself are being prepared. For now, the 70 km section of the Shiodome main line will be made operational.

Shiodome main line route map

.

Distribution and monetization

Basically, there is no problem, but illegal activities, pirated releases, fraud, and antisocial use are prohibited.
